Evansville.EvilleCon:
EvilleCon is an annual three day anime convention held during March at the Holiday Inn Evansville Airport in Evansville, Indiana.


== Programming ==
The convention typically offers animation screenings, cosplay chess, costume contests, dancing, demonstrations, guests, karaoke, lessons, merchandise vendors, movies, music, panel discussions, tabletop games, and video games.


== History ==
EvilleCon started in 2009 as a one-day free anime convention created by Otona no Otaku and Otaku Anonymous anime and manga clubs at the Evansville Central Library.
